in fantasy, I can clearly see
This is really me
Breaking the tide
Of hide and seek, let me surmise my destiny
Looking out the window, and I…
markdownRemark.html: No more surprises in fantasy, I can clearly see This is really me Breaking the tide Of hide and seek, let me surmise my destiny Looking out the window, and I cannot see My visions, have faded in obscurity And I try to sleep But these fuckin’ demons keep haunting me Flashes of the past, they give me the chills When it’s time to roll, I just slip and slide As I flounder through the day, there’s no other way Guess that’s my way Of life, time’s slipping away I cannot sleep, I cannot pray What’s left is a phantom Life’s gone away through the window As I gaze
